channel.title: Thinking About Making Server From Scratch
channel.description: Yeah, I'm thinking of making a server from scratch. And starting off with Moparscape for the blank source, how can I make it so that silabs works for it?

item.title: Thinking About Making Server From Scratch
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

I’d give up now if I was you, but as I don’t want to seem like a discouraging person; You need to make it so that the max item ID the server overall can hold is over 9999, or you cannot get ‘silab’ items. Also, if your reply to this post is going to be ‘How do I do that’, I say read the rules.

3. We are not a Spoonfeeding community. We do not teach in an oversimplified manner to discourage independent thought. We encourage independent thought, meaning you must help yourselves before requesting help. Failure to provide some sort of prior knowledge or work to the problem will result in a lock of the topic. This is final.

Read full topic
item.source: Thinking About Making Server From Scratch
